taskDescription:
Solve the formula <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>I</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mi>P</mi>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">I = Prt</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t</annotation></semantics></math>. This formula is used to calculate simple interest <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>I</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">I</annotation></semantics></math>, for a principal <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>P</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">P</annotation></semantics></math>, invested at a rate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r</annotation></semantics></math>, for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t</annotation></semantics></math> years.
